data.actual_result: On Edge: Content flickers and it goes back to the top of the main topic. On Firefox: 1st click does nothing, 2nd click activates the right heading, after that it toggles between 1st and chosen heading. Copied Urls also not working.
data.expected_result: The content should jump to the selected subheading.
data.short_description: [Firefox, Edge only] Developer Portal navigation links to anchor not working
data.steps_to_repro: - go to Developer Portal documentation - navigate to a topic (like Channel) - click on a "subheading" (like Modify Channel)
